author: protolambda
content:
For those updating to v0.9+ already: I just updated ZCLI to spec v0.9.0, checkout zcli v0.0.16:
- removed transfers/crosslinks
- updated `zcli meta committees` (lists committees for each slot, from previous to next epoch)
- added `zcli meta proposers` (lists proposer indices, for current and next epoch)
- added `zcli check *ssz type*` (checks if it is valid to the schema).
ZCLI for v0.9.1 out soon â„¢

author: protolambda
content: ZRNT v0.9.1 / ZCLI v0.0.17 are shipped <:shipit:636891691927732224>
